short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a more focused reading experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever visited a website where the layout was rather ugly and you found it difficult to focus on finding what you were looking for due to unnecessary sidebars, ad columns and too many buttons? This extension will solve these problems for you and provide you with a smoother and clearer reading experience.

This plug-in currently supports displaying the main content of the page and hiding non-main information such as sidebars and advertising columns. 


*** 
Enter the reading mode shortcut key Shift+ArrowUp, and exit by Esc key. 
***
